website_summaries.verdict: Apple's $1,199 iMac doesn't offer the same home entertainment features as Windows-based all-in-ones, but its speed, looks, and the future utility of its Thunderbolt port make it a strong choice for performance-sensitive professionals.
pros: As the most-affordable iMac, the Apple iMac 21.5-inch offers competitive speed, the unique potential of its Thunderbolt port, and Apple's trademark design leadership
cons: The 21.5-inch iMac isn't the best all-in-one for home entertainment, and its performance competitiveness suffers without an option for more video memory

customer_reviews.title: Works fine. But it’s dusty and a little dirty
customer_reviews.text: Certified refurbished? Didn’t come with any certification. Was hand packed. It’s okay. Works fine. But it’s dusty and a little dirty. Took off the RAM cover and it’s full of dust clumps. This doesn’t appear to have been refurbished. Just seems like a used computer.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew L Hoppock

customer_reviews.title: Just don’t do it!
customer_reviews.text: The computer did not work at all. The screen had lines in it, the screen would glitch during the power on, and then it would cut off. Total waste.
customer_reviews.author: sarena elgin

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get this and there’s a HUGE crack in the screen, the screen is coming lose and the corner is dented. I’m so disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Waste Your Time On This Garbage!!
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste your time or money. Computer arrived and the screen was broken. Powered on, but there was zero screeen activity. Only knew it was on because you could hear the fan running. Piece of garbage. Returned it the same day I received it.
customer_reviews.author: William Emmanuel

customer_reviews.title: Works, even the peripherals work. Not sure why people 1 star because their keyboard doesn't work...
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm, mouse, keyboard and everything... Needed it for app development for one of our team members. They're loving it. Had to upgrade the OS first to latest and greatest just to install Xcode, but took close to an hour. No biggie! The whole system works like a charm. :)
customer_reviews.author: WinnComm LLC

customer_reviews.title: Very good product for the money
customer_reviews.text: Computer is great and in great condition. Packaged very well! It took a few minutes and a google search to set up user and iCloud and is basically a brand new computer. Mine came with the original mac keyboard and magic mouse. This computer cannot be updated to mojave, but high sierra is working very well. No issues and I would order this again for the price. I can hear the fan running, but I have read that you can take it to the apple store and they will clean the fans for free in case this has happened to anyone else.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I have worked on limited basis it seems ok just ...
customer_reviews.text: I have worked on limited basis it seems ok just have some issues doing the updates... will let you know more in a couple of months.. Thks!
customer_reviews.author: G. Labat

customer_reviews.title: Just like new!  Very satisfied with the purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Everything arrived in mint condition and got everything setup without issues. Very satisfied with the computer. It is a bit bigger then I thought, and quite heavy but the computer itself is excellent! No damage, no scratch, just like new!
customer_reviews.author: Nate "Skate"

customer_reviews.title: Great Refurbished Product
customer_reviews.text: All we wanted was a nice display and low profile mac to keep around for Internet access. This product was perfect. If that is all you really use your machine for, don't buy a new mac. Just my advice. I would have given a 5 star rating, but the power cord delivered with the machine was defective. I would not stay plugged in the machine for longer than an hour. It would slip out and disconnect the machine. Fortunately, we had another power cord lying around. Aside from that, we liked this mac so much we bought another refurbished unit for my sister.
customer_reviews.author: WillNFLA

customer_reviews.title: Great computer for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I’m super impressed with this and I do not regret my purchase whatsoever! Everything is in perfect working order and I would definitely recommend this to someone looking for a high quality desktop computer. It’s cheap, it works flawlessly, and it’s a Mac! 5 stars all the way you have yourself one happy customer!
customer_reviews.author: Trenth

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the time nor the money
customer_reviews.text: Operating system would not load. Been back and forth with apple support. Mac OS X Lion is what it wants to install on internet recovery. But since I am not the original owner it is not available to me. So kinda stuck.
customer_reviews.author: Dragoljub

customer_reviews.title: The Easy Of Setup !!! Had forgotten how cool it is to plug it in and GO.
customer_reviews.text: Yes... I must say I was more than a little paranoid after had already ordered and then reading some of the reviews. But I have been very impressed with the order. I did order the wireless keyboard and mouse and seemed like most of the negative reviews were dealing with that connection.
customer_reviews.author: #PatriotOfHope

customer_reviews.title: Decent.
customer_reviews.text: This was bought as an extra computer station and for kid to do home schooling. It works but the screen seems to either have minor sun damage or heat damage from storage but you can only tell when the computer is off. If it didn't have this flaw I'd give it 5 stars. Working so far for several days without problems.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Great Transaction
customer_reviews.text: Super fast shipping good quality true to description appropriate packaging actually superb packaging
customer_reviews.author: Faith Webster

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal
customer_reviews.text: I was worried that after reading some reviews that mine was not going to be functional or in good physical condition. Mine came in secure packaging, no critical damage, there were two very minor scratches on the screen, but they're easily forgettable unless you try to look for them. Keyboard and mouse are not Apple products, however, still function well with the mac. OS was considerably out of date, but it was pretty easy to get it up to High Sierra. This model cannot upgrade to Mojave. Highly recommended purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Uribe

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money for an internet machine.
customer_reviews.text: The machine arrived in excellent condition with an Apple wireless keyboard and mouse. The machine runs fine. It is a little slow, but, it is an older machine. I may upgrade the memory. I can't complain. The machine does what I want it to do. The screen is bright and clear. Good machine.
customer_reviews.author: A Swank

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Does not come with a magic keyboard or mouse but I just bought a cheaper wireless keyboard and mouse have not had any problems with the computer I’ve had it for a month
customer_reviews.author: George V.

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged- will update on return process
customer_reviews.text: Received the computer yesterday’s ns opened it today. The screen is cracked, quite severely on the top right corner of the screen. I just requested a return and will update about this as soon as I hear from them.
customer_reviews.author: Bebe

customer_reviews.title: Worked great
customer_reviews.text: For what it is,a 2011 model, it works great. Got it faster than expected. Came with wired keyboard and after market mouse. Works well but wish I hadn’t gotten that late of a model as it is not upgradable. But that is my fault for not reading more thoroughly. Overall if you at looking for something cheap that still works well for kids or elder parent, this would be a great choice.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Shelly

customer_reviews.title: Good value for a Mac but not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: It was almost new when I got it. Everything was working well except for now it is super slow and downloading anything on here takes forever. I have used it for a little less than a year but I will be selling it because I no longer use it because of how slow it works.
customer_reviews.author: Jazmin Galindo

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: This was a great buy. The computer works well and is reasonably fast.i needed an Apple computer to run a program built for apple and this does the job well. The finish is pretty good too. Doesn't look brand new but doesn't look refurbished either. For the price, I love it
customer_reviews.author: Rene

customer_reviews.title: No mouse or keyboard like advertised
customer_reviews.text: Opened the box yesterday super excited and opened it up and no keyboard or mouse like advertised. Pretty frustrating I can’t even use the computer till I have those items. I really hope they send me a keyboard and mouse. Because their mistakes. If not I’ll be furious.
customer_reviews.author: Mickey Adams

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied Customer
customer_reviews.text: I'm currently satisfied with my purchase, it seems to be in good working condition everything works. the only thing that I didn't received with my package is a power cord. but I'm OK with the overal packaging, also thinking to purchase another one soon.
customer_reviews.author: Juvelle Harper

customer_reviews.title: Amazing desktop
customer_reviews.text: This is a amazing computer for this price. I was skeptical at first put so far I have nothing but good things other then my mouse had a shortage in it. I contacted the seller and they immediately responded and shipped out my mouse. Both the shipping for the desktop and replacement mouse were incredible fast.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: iMac computer
customer_reviews.text: I love the product and very user friendly and the price very affordable
customer_reviews.author: jmg

customer_reviews.title: This is a good product
customer_reviews.text: Unboxing the product and setting up was fairly easily along with the instructions given. The memory is smooth, the graphics are fairly sharp, and the speakers are fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Mary B.

customer_reviews.title: Computer crashes often. SD card reader worked once, ...
customer_reviews.text: Computer crashes often. SD card reader worked once, now does not recognize cards. System says no reader is present.
customer_reviews.author: CoverupLtd

customer_reviews.title: Solid, Not Perfect. Worth the buy
customer_reviews.text: The Mac came in fairly good condition, with only a few big scratches on the casing and mouse. My issue was with the mouse and keyboard, they dont connect automatically! I had to go out and buy a wired mouse and keyboard just to turn my Bluetooth on!
customer_reviews.author: Ave

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend this item at all
customer_reviews.text: A few days after the return date, the screen shut down. Rebooting helped. For the last month I have been getting memory error messages. I haven't even loaded more than a few files. Screen keeps giving problems and now I cant even use the Apple beyond log in.
customer_reviews.author: Laura-Jane

customer_reviews.title: Can’t Run Latest Version Of MacOS
customer_reviews.text: Great computer overall considering how old it is. It had hardly any scratches or scrapes great condition. Except the Magic keyboard stopped working the next. Took it to the Apple store for repair but couldn’t so I bought a brand new one. But the only problem is with this Model the you software because or the ram or the graphics card.
customer_reviews.author: Black Sword

customer_reviews.title: It is important that everyone know they are honest
customer_reviews.text: The description of my iMac was as described. I have had my computer for a couple weeks and so far no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Vegan for Life

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product!!! Cannot even tell that it is refurbished!!! Works like new!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amber Hall

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my kids. They and I could not be more pleased. Not a single scratch on the computer. Came with generic keyboard and mouse, but still great for the kids!
customer_reviews.author: Derek mollineaux

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: Got the iMac on November 6 and immediately set it up. Everything seems to be working smoothly so far from the internet connectivity to CD player. Am seriously considering getting another one from the seller.
customer_reviews.author: JZT

customer_reviews.title: it works
customer_reviews.text: it's a MAC, I used it to lift my car and change a tire. What do you think I used it for?
customer_reviews.author: E. Sparks

customer_reviews.title: Nice Computer
customer_reviews.text: This was an older model computer but in excellent condition. However; this computer can not be updated since its a 2011. Great computer for anyone wanting to try a MAC for a low price.
customer_reviews.author: L.Designs

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY
customer_reviews.text: this came with a missing key on the keyboard and works SO slowly compared to the other computers in my house with the same wireless network. I can't even get anything to open. The monitor is also extremely loud and you can't even leave it plugged in because of the noise. please do not buy from this "company"
customer_reviews.author: daisymaisy

customer_reviews.title: May not be a good option.
customer_reviews.text: The keyboard and mouse are not working. Now the dilemma to return or to keep it.
customer_reviews.author: Partha

customer_reviews.title: Kanga has the best customer support
customer_reviews.text: The machine I had received had some issues, but Kanga's customer support was outstanding in helping me remedy the issue very quickly. Would purchase from them in the future if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Lora Williams

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my grandson and he loves it. It works great and he loves the big screen
customer_reviews.author: Debora

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I love my Apple IMac and glad I was able to Afford one.
customer_reviews.author: Lionel B. Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy a refurbished computer
customer_reviews.text: Super slow. I regret buying a refurbished computer. Wish I had paid more money for a brand new one.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer OToole

customer_reviews.title: Like new
customer_reviews.text: The best purchase I ever made. It’s like new, highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No issues
customer_reviews.text: I had no issues. Everything functions as it should and it arrived in perfect condition!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: plugged it up and it started updating. so far so good
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Bad Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Won’t stay on. Powers off every time turned on and locked to a previous user.
customer_reviews.author: C. S.

customer_reviews.title: Defective Unit / Parts
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 2 units, but mouse and keyboard on 1 unit didn't work!
customer_reviews.author: All World

customer_reviews.title: Computer look good but mouse is completely broken now I have to ...
customer_reviews.text: Computer look good but mouse is completely broken now I have to go to apple and buy new one. Maybe I should've purchased a new computer not refurbished
customer_reviews.author: Roger

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The mouse doesnt work and the keyboard is junk probably gonna send it back after os download
customer_reviews.author: wayland beggs

customer_reviews.title: ... the latest getting ready to install Windows it is like new thank you so
customer_reviews.text: It wouldn’t take my password wiped it out reinstalled os updated to the latest getting ready to install Windows it is like new thank you so much
customer_reviews.author: Randy K.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Everything came in almost perfect condition and works like new. Definitely happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Lane

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The mouse came broken and the computer is very dirty. I honestly can’t even test the computer yet because I need to get a new mouse.
customer_reviews.author: Alec Eskander

customer_reviews.title: Came with none working mouse.
customer_reviews.text: I live in the middle of nowhere and order this computer for my kids homeschooling. It came and I turned it on to set it up, and guess what? The mouse wasn’t already synced to the computer, so after a call to customer service the inform me I would have to purchase another mouse to setup my computer up so I could sync the mouse that came with it to the computer. After emailing the seller it seemed as though the didn’t care that I had to spend more money and travel to Walmart witch is almost an hour away to get their computer to work. Not happy!
customer_reviews.author: mickayla

customer_reviews.title: Happy iMac
customer_reviews.text: Works great..so far so good. Added some new RAM and works even faster than before. My impression so far has been that this is a quality machine. And hey, it's an Apple iMac (mid 2011); they are great computers! Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: James Walsh

customer_reviews.title: Apple PC
customer_reviews.text: I found this just brought me for new computers in for the price I couldn't beat it and my daughter was very interested in a Apple computer so I can grab it for that price for they were all going
customer_reviews.author: Miki hues

product_meta.title: Apple iMac MC309LL/A 21.5-Inch Desktop (Renewed)
product_meta.description: Size:MC309LL/AIntroducing the new iMac. The ultimate all-in-one goes all out. The new iMac features next-generation quad-core processors and the fastest graphics ever in an all-in-one computer. It also brings Thunderbolt I/O technology to the desktop for lightning-fast data transfer. And a new FaceTime HD camera lets you make full-screen HD video calls.* All from a beautiful widescreen LED-backlit display that takes up just a sliver of your desk. It’s everything you want in a desktop. Now more powerful, more advanced, and even more incredible than before. *FaceTime requires a FaceTime-enabled iOS device with a Wi-Fi connection or a FaceTime-enabled Mac with an Internet connection and FaceTime for Mac software (may require separate purchase). Not available in all areas.
feature_bullets: 2.5GHz quad-core Intel Core i5 with 6MB on-chip shared L3 cache

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars155 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
